content: I have Migraines can we make more documents dark mode friendly?

There are a few Chrome extensions that do this for Google docs, This one has good reviews https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/dark-mode-google-docs/iabnclnclchijjckhdljmocghgmgnnii
If you are using a mobile device, you can change it in the app
[iOS](https://support.google.com/docs/answer/9955476?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DiOS)
[android](https://support.google.com/docs/answer/9955476?hl=en-IN&ref_topic=9055399)
[PDFs can also be viewed in dark mode](https://www.makeuseof.com/tag/give-adobe-reader-a-dark-theme-for-easier-pdf-reading/)
I'm using the chrome extension and mostly the pictures are the issue because they invert and get a lot brighter
Sorry about that, you may be able to use accessibility settings to show the ALT text of the images in place of the image.
